TextView.android:text:
Hey, Thanks for checking out our SLI(Sign Language Interpreter) app.
In this app, we tried to cut the communication gap between the deaf and dumb community and us in our way by using deep learning(transfer learning).
The neural network model that is running in the background is 'VGG16' which is trained on the custom dataset and compressed using tflite.
We tried out different models and even object detection models with different frameworks. If you want to check out all those different models or want to contribute to the project.
Good news: The project is open source! Check out the Github Repo
